room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Guild" by The Ruse Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: Awesome experience! The Ruse is by far the best escape room I have ever done!

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Guild" by The Ruse Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: What an amazing experience! We worked as a group of friends in the Inventors Guild room and had a blast!  Brit was AWESOME as a host and was very good at knowing when we needed a clue and when we didn't want one. We got down to the wire but were victorious! I can't wait to go back and do the Trophy Room!
